posts.excerpt: He was an author, philosopher, NYU Professor, and general gangster who had the voice of a 40 year old man despite being 90.
posts.title: RIP James Carse
posts.content: He was an author, philosopher, NYU Professor, and general gangster who had the voice of a 40 year old man despite being 90. He wrote a book called Finite and Infinite Game which will blow my mind, once I finally finish it and give it the focus it deserves. I’ll write a review of it sometime later and try to do it justice, for I have no hope of doing it justice here and now. This post is just to say that JC was a brilliant and deeply original thinker (and maybe also to test the post-rendering order on my site.) Anyway, rest in peace beautiful man.
